chapter.title: Requirements
chapter.para: Spring Dynamic Modules 2.x supports JDK level 5.0 and above and OSGi R4 and above. For JDK 1.4, consider using Spring Dynamic Modules 1.x. Bundles deployed for use with Spring Dynamic Modules should specify "Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2" in their manifest (OSGi R4). We test against Equinox 3.4.x, Felix 1.4.0+, and Knopflerfish 2.2.x as part of our continuous integration process.
